channel.title: Error on 好久不见
channel.description: Recent content in Error on 好久不见

item.title: Error.CSharp
item.description: 异常 在可以调用 OLE 之前，必须将当前线程设置为单线程单元(STA)模式，请确保您的Main函数带有STAThreadAttribute标记 解决 Main

item.title: Error.MYSQL
item.description: 1175 Description You are using safe update mode and you tried to update a table without a WHERE that uses a KEY column To disable safe mode, toggle the option in Preferences -> SQL Editor and reconnect. Answer SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES = 0;
